name: 🗿
description:
🗿🗿🗿🗿🗿🗿🗿🗿

Collect the gnomes.

Mouse to look, WASD / Arrow keys to move

ESC to pause

List of assets used:

  • Music
    • Ambiance (Jesús Lastra - Weird)
    • Radio loop (snippet from i\believe\in\angels - overwhelming)
  • 3D Models
    • Old oak tree
    • Small trees
    • Boats
    • Radio
    • 🗿
    • Gnome Chompski (sorry Valve)
  • Textures
    • Funny images on the walls (jokanhiyou)
    • Door
    • Brick wall
    • Grass
    • Dirt road

Big thanks to the good pals that helped with testing and design!
